message:
অবরোধের মধ্যেও আগামীকাল ব্রিটিশ কাউন্সিলের সকল পরীক্ষা নেয়ার সিদ্ধান্ত নিয়েছে কর্তৃপক্ষ। এতো অনেক পরীক্ষার্থী অনুরোধ করলেও তারা এটার জন্য পরবর্তী কোন সময়সূচী দেয় নাই.. বরং তারা এই মেসেজটা সবাইর কাছে পেীছে দে....

As you may be aware a blockade has been called in Bangladesh and will co-inside with a number of scheduled ACCA exam sittings, we wanted to keep you updated on the situation. Currently, all exams are scheduled to take place as planned. The safety, security and wellbeing of our candidates is our number one priority and we are doing everything possible to ensure that the ACCA examinations take place as scheduled. At present we are proposing that on 2nd December exams will go ahead at the scheduled time. In case we need to make any changes to our scheduled exam sittings, we will notify students through ACCA communication channels. All candidates are advised not to take any undue risks while moving to and fro from the Exam venue. British Council is not responsible for any incident which may occur while a candidate is travelling to our out of our exams venue. We wish you best of luck for your ACCA Examinations and assure you that we are doing everything possible to enable you to take your examinations.

Regards
